DOC.brief_summary: Chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) play important role implantation . The aim study evaluate effect intrauterine injection hCG embryo transfer IVF/ICSI implantation pregnancy rate . The rational intrauterine hCG injection attract regulatory T cell improve implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Intra-uterine Injection Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin ( hCG ) Before Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Human chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) find secrete immediately fertilization embryo . It play important role implantation attract regulatory T cell endometrium . Rational : Intrauterine injection hCG embryo transfer IVF/ICSI may increase endometrial regulatory T cell ( Treg ) improve implantation pregnancy rate . Aim work : To study effect intrauterine injection hCG embryo transfer implantation pregnancy rate IVF/ICSI . Subjects : Infertile patient undergo ICSI . Inclusion criterion : - Female age le 40 year - Male factor infertility - Normal female hormonal profile uterine cavity Exclusion criterion : - Previous ICSI failure - Azoospermia - Endometriosis Study group : Intrauterine injection 100 iu hCG ( group 1 ) 200 iu hCG ( group 2 ) do dummy embryo transfer do 10-15 minute actual embryo transfer . Control group : The embryo transfer do without prior intrauterine injection hCG Main outcome measure : Implantation pregnancy rate Secondary outcome measure : miscarriage delivery rate
DOC.criteria: male factor infertility normal female hormonal profile normal uterine cavity previous ICSI failure endometriosis azoospermia
